short_summary: Procurement, delivery and installation of office chairs
description: Acquisition, livraison and installation de chaises de bureau pour Ottawa by Health Canada on or by March 31st, 2023
full_summary:
Here is a rewritten version of the entry in a more professional format:

## Procurement Announcement

**Tender Title:** Procurement, Delivery and Installation of Office Chairs to Ottawa

**Reference Number:** PW-22-01007408 (Amendment 1)

**Solicitation Number:** 1000244552

**Notice of Publication:** 2022-09-16

**Tender Closing Date:** 2022-10-03T14:00:00

## Procurement Details

**Procurement Method:** Competitive - Limited Tendering

**Trade Agreements:** The Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Procurement Category:** Goods and Services (GG)

**Products:** Office Chairs

**Regions of Delivery:** Ontario (excluding National Capital Region)

## Client and Contractor Information

**Contracting Entity:** Health Canada

**Address**:
200, Eglantine Driveway, Tunney's Pasture
Ottawa, ON, K1A 0K9, Canada

**Contact Information:**

Christian Belanger
christian.belanger@canada.ca
613-697-0681

## Tender Documents

Download the tender documents at:
https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/09/22/681500a57c4523105b476943fee4025b/solicitation_1000244552_q_a_1_eng_fr.pdf
https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/09/16/01ff7787bd4b74e99c5943730b1ef49e/1000244552_rfb_eng_f.pdf
https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/09/16/cc56b2fe3bb03c133740493e5b0e3be5/1000244552_rfb_fr_f.pdf

## Tender Description

Health Canada requires the purchase, delivery and installation of office furniture to Ottawa on or by March 31st, 2023. This requirement is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA). There are no security requirements associated with the requirement. Consult the bid solicitation document for additional information.

**End of Tender Announcement**

Original Text has been edited out. 

Let me know if you need any adjustments!
